en-US.name: neo chat
en-US.description: Ask questions with Neo Chat and get concise answers powered by configurable AI providers with optional follow-up suggestions.
examplePhrases: Alexa, open neo chat
Alexa, ask neo chat what is quantum computing

en-GB.name: neo chat
en-GB.description: Ask questions with Neo Chat and get concise answers powered by configurable AI providers with optional follow-up suggestions.
examplePhrases: Alexa, open neo chat
Alexa, ask neo chat who is Ada Lovelace

en-CA.description: Ask questions with Neo Chat and get concise answers powered by configurable AI providers with optional follow-up suggestions.

en-AU.description: Ask questions with Neo Chat and get concise answers powered by configurable AI providers with optional follow-up suggestions.

es-ES.name: neo chat
es-ES.summary: Asistente de IA multilingüe para Alexa
es-ES.description: Haz preguntas a Neo Chat y recibe respuestas breves con proveedores de IA configurables y sugerencias opcionales.
examplePhrases: Alexa, abre neo chat
Alexa, pregunta a neo chat qué es la inteligencia artificial

es-MX.name: neo chat
es-MX.summary: Asistente de IA multilingüe para Alexa
es-MX.description: Haz preguntas a Neo Chat y recibe respuestas breves con proveedores de IA configurables y sugerencias opcionales.

es-US.description: Haz preguntas a Neo Chat y recibe respuestas breves con proveedores de IA configurables y sugerencias opcionales.

fr-FR.name: neo chat
fr-FR.description: Posez vos questions à Neo Chat et obtenez des réponses concises avec des fournisseurs IA configurables et des suggestions optionnelles.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ouvre neo chat
Alexa, demande à neo chat quel est l'âge de George Clooney

fr-CA.name: neo chat
fr-CA.description: Posez vos questions à Neo Chat et obtenez des réponses concises avec des fournisseurs IA configurables et des suggestions optionnelles.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ouvre neo chat
Alexa, demande à neo chat qui est Alan Turing

ja-JP.name: neo chat
ja-JP.summary: Alexa向け多言語AIアシスタント
ja-JP.description: Neo Chat に質問すると、設定可能なAIプロバイダーで簡潔に回答します。追加提案にも対応します。
examplePhrases: アレクサ、neo chat を開いて
アレクサ、neo chat に量子コンピューターとは何か聞いて

de-DE.name: neo chat
de-DE.description: Stelle Neo Chat Fragen und erhalte kurze Antworten über konfigurierbare KI-Anbieter mit optionalen Folgefragen.
examplePhrases: Alexa, öffne neo chat
Alexa, frage neo chat was ist künstliche Intelligenz

it-IT.name: neo chat
it-IT.description: Fai domande a Neo Chat e ricevi risposte concise con provider IA configurabili e suggerimenti opzionali.
examplePhrases: Alexa, apri neo chat
Alexa, chiedi a neo chat che cos'è il machine learning

hi-IN.name: neo chat
hi-IN.description: Neo Chat से सवाल पूछें और कॉन्फ़िगर किए जा सकने वाले AI प्रदाताओं से संक्षिप्त उत्तर पाएं, वैकल्पिक सुझावों सहित।
examplePhrases: Alexa, neo chat खोलो
Alexa, neo chat से पूछो आर्टिफिशियल इंटेलिजेंस क्या है

pt-BR.name: neo chat
pt-BR.summary: Assistente de IA multilíngue para Alexa
pt-BR.description: Faça perguntas ao Neo Chat e receba respostas curtas com provedores de IA configuráveis e sugestões opcionais.
examplePhrases: Alexa, abra neo chat
Alexa, pergunte ao neo chat o que é inteligência artificial

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Enable skill testing in Development, then test both launch and one-shot utterances. Example one-shot: 'Alexa, ask neo chat what is photosynthesis'. Verify stop/cancel behavior and follow-up continuity.
